模块 com.example.project3_studentroster
程序包 com.example.project3_studentroster

类 TuitionManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3_studentroster.TuitionManagerController
public class TuitionManagerController extends Object
The user interface controller class that defines all actions of clicking and data manipulation. Uses an instance of Roster class to process the tuitions. Handles wrong input, errors, and exceptions.
作者:
Yuchen Wei, Denghao Sun

  • 方法详细资料

    • checkFullTimeCredit

      private boolean checkFullTimeCredit(int credit)
      Helper method that checks if a Resident student's credit hours validity.
      参数:
      credit - number to be checked.
      返回:
      true if the credit hours is valid, false otherwise.

    • checkInternationalCredit

      private boolean checkInternationalCredit(int credit)
      Helper method that checks if an International student's credit hours validity.
      参数:
      credit - number to be checked.
      返回:
      true if the credit hours is valid, false otherwise.

    • setStudyAbroadStatus

      public void setStudyAbroadStatus(String name, String major)
      A helper method to create a Resident Student and add to the roster.
      参数:
      name - contains the information of the student.
      major - contains the major of the student.

    • singleCalculate

      public void singleCalculate(Student student)
      A method to create a single tuition due of the student.
      参数:
      student - the student who is about to get processed.

    • addResident

      private void addResident(String name, String major, int creditHours)
      A helper method to create a Resident Student and add to the roster.
      参数:
      name - contains the information of the student.
      major - contains the major of the student.
      creditHours - contains the credits of the student.

    • addNonResident

      private void addNonResident(String name, String major, int creditHours)
      A helper method to create a NonResident Student and add to the roster.
      参数:
      name - contains the information of the student.
      major - contains the major of the student.
      creditHours - contains the credits of the student.

    • addTristate

      private void addTristate(String name, String major, int creditHours, String triArea)
      A helper method to create a Tristate Student and add to the roster.
      参数:
      name - contains the information of the student.
      major - contains the major of the student.
      creditHours - contains the credits of the student.
      triArea - contains the state area of the student.

    • addInternation

      private void addInternation(String name, String major, int creditHours, boolean studyAbroad)
      A helper method to create an Internation Student and add to the roster.
      参数:
      name - contains the information of the student.
      major - contains the major of the student.
      creditHours - contains the credits of the student.
      studyAbroad - contains the status of studyAbroad of the student.

    • removeStudent

      private void removeStudent(String name, String major)
      A helper method to remove a Student from the roster.
      参数:
      name - contains the information of the student.
      major - contains the major of the student.
